dashboard.label: Search For Queries
dashboard.description: Search Across the L.A.M.E. F.A.D.S. collection of queries and all existing queries from dashboards
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_0aIlWvnr":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"backgroundColor":"#62b3b2","tableFormat":{"rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByBackgroundColor)","headerBackgroundColor":"> backgroundColor | setColorChannel(tableHeaderBackgroundColorConfig)","rowColors":"> rowBackgroundColors | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)","headerColor":"> headerBackgroundColor | maxContrast(tableRowColorMaxContrast)"}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_M72bY34H"},"title":"Queries from Existing Dashboard"},"viz_ksHipRim":{"type":"splunk.table","options":{"backgroundColor":"> themes.defaultBackgroundColor","tableFormat":{"rowBackgroundColors":"> table | seriesByIndex(0) | pick(tableAltRowBackgroundColorsByTheme)"}},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_DvMcDMw8"},"title":"Queries from L.A.M.E. F.A.D.S."}},"dataSources":{"ds_M72bY34H":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views
| search eai:acl.app=* AND author!="nobody"
| rex field="id" "(?<urlField>[^\/]+)$"

``` extract sourcetype, source, or eventtype field & values; exclude negated matches ```
| rex field=eai:data "(?<!(?#Skip excluded sourcetypes)\bNOT\s)(?i)(?<sourcetypes>sourcetype(?:\s*(?:=|::)[\s\x22]*[-.:\w\x2a]+|\s+IN\s+\x28[-.:\w,\s]+\x29))" max_match=0
| rex field=eai:data "(?<!(?#Skip excluded sources)\bNOT\s)(?i)(?<sources>source(?:\s*(?:=|::)[\s\x22]*[-.:\w\x2a]+|\s+IN\s+\x28[-.:\w,\s]+\x29))" max_match=0
| rex field=eai:data "(?<!(?#Skip excluded eventtypes)\bNOT\s)(?i)(?<eventtypes>eventtype(?:\s*(?:=|::)[\s\x22]*[-.:\w\x2a]+|\s+IN\s+\x28[-.:\w,\s]+\x29))" max_match=0

``` extract host and index field & values; exclude negated matches ```
| rex field=eai:data "(?#Skip excluded hosts)(?<!\bNOT\s)(?i)(?<hosts>host(?:\s*(?:=|::)[\s\x22]*[-.:\w\x2a]+|\s+IN\s+\x28[-.:\w,\s]+\x29))" max_match=0
| rex field=eai:data "(?#Skip excluded indexes)(?<!\bNOT\s)(?i)(?<indexes>index(?:\s*(?:=|::)[\s\x22]*[-.:\w\x2a]+|\s+IN\s+\x28[-.:\w,\s]+\x29))" max_match=0

``` extract Lookup, InputLookup, and OutputLookup commands & values; must always be after a pipe character ```
| rex field=eai:data "(?i)\x7c\s*(?<lookups>lookup\b[\s\x22]+[-.:\w]+)" max_match=0
| rex field=eai:data "(?i)\x7c\s*(?<inputlookups>inputlookup\b[\s\x22]+[-.:\w]+)" max_match=0
| rex field=eai:data "(?i)\x7c\s*(?<outputlookups>outputlookup\b[\s\x22]+[-.:\w]+)" max_match=0

``` extract the whole query ```
| rex field=eai:data "(?s)<query>(?<queries>.*?)<\/query>.*?" max_match=0

``` Trim extraneous double quotes from captured fields ```
| rex mode=sed field=sourcetypes "s/\x22//g"
| rex mode=sed field=sources "s/\x22//g"
| rex mode=sed field=eventtypes "s/\x22//g"
| rex mode=sed field=hosts "s/\x22//g"
| rex mode=sed field=indexes "s/\x22//g"
| rex mode=sed field=lookups "s/\x22//g"
| rex mode=sed field=inputlookups "s/\x22//g"
| rex mode=sed field=outputlookups "s/\x22//g"

| eval datasources=mvdedup(mvappend(sourcetypes, sources, eventtypes, indexes, hosts, lookups, inputlookups, outputlookups))
| fields queries, sources, sourcetypes, eventtypes, datasources, app.owner, urlField, eai:acl.app author, eai:acl.sharing details, mitre, usecase

| rename eai:acl.app as myapp
| fillnull value="N/A" datasources
| fields urlField, queries, datasources, myapp
| mvexpand queries

| search queries="*$search_filter$*"
| stats values(*) as * by queries
| table urlField, queries, myapp"},"name":"Get_All_Queries"},"ds_DvMcDMw8":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":" | inputlookup lame_fads.csv
 | search query="*$search_filter$*" OR description="*$search_filter$*"
 | rename query as queries, app as myapp, url as urlField
 | table queries, myapp, urlField, description

 "},"name":"Use_Lame_Fads"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"},"input_itjGsNcc":{"options":{"defaultValue":"Default Text","token":"search_filter"},"title":"SPL Keyword","type":"input.text"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale"},"structure":[{"item":"viz_0aIlWvnr","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":660,"h":610}},{"item":"viz_ksHipRim","type":"block","position":{"x":660,"y":0,"w":530,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp","input_itjGsNcc"]},"description":"Search Across the L.A.M.E. F.A.D.S. collection of queries and all existing queries from dashboards","title":"Search For Queries"}
